schema.name: Mashed Sweet Potato

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the sweet potatoes and cut them into chunks.
Place the chunks into a pot and cover with water.
Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium and simmer until tender, about 15 minutes.
Drain the potatoes and return them to the pot.
Mash the sweet potatoes until smooth.
Stir in the shredded Parmesan cheese until well combined and cheese is melted.

schema.description: This Mashed Sweet Potato recipe is perfect for those looking for a healthy and delicious side dish. With its low sodium and low sugar profile, it's a guilt-free addition to any meal. Perfect for anyone following a healthy lifestyle, these mashed sweet potatoes are enriched with Parmesan cheese, offering a tasty twist on a classic favorite.
